title: Paracutin Volcano
creator_credit: Air Force First Motion Picture Unit
brief_description: Documentary film record of the 1946 research expedition to the volcano, Paricutin, in Mexico. Includes scenes of the volcano and the lava flow as well as scenes of the crater and the erupting volcano taken from a helicopter.
description: Documentary film record of the 1946 research expedition to the volcano, Paricutin, in Mexico. Includes scenes of the volcano and the lava flow as well as scenes of the crater and the erupting volcano taken from a helicopter.
